results.name: (n / SmallestPrimeFactor(n)) * GreatestPrimeFactor(n).
comment: a(n)>=n; a(n)=n iff n is a prime power: a(A000961(n))=A000961(n);
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 05 2007
